anatomicalAxesOrientation._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ) for this common coordinate space.

defaultImage._instruction: Add one or several image files used as visual representation of this common coordinate space.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this common coordinate space.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this common coordinate space.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this common coordinate space.

howToCite._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this common coordinate space. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.

nativeUnit._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this common coordinate space.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this common coordinate space.

axesOrigin._instruction: Enter the origin of this common coordinate space (central point where axes intersect; 2D: [x, y] or 3D:[x, y, z]).

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this common coordinate space.

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this common coordinate space.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this common coordinate space.
